column2:
"Well, see you around, pal. Keep practicing
with those double blades."

"Hey, you made it back in one piece, huh?
Your report checks out, so I'd say
everything went just fine."

"If you keep wielding double blades like
that, there won't be anything to worry about."
"Oh, and go ahead and keep the double sabers I gave you. They're all yours."

"A new Client Order is available for Barbara.

Barbara can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."

"ダブルセイバー系の基本攻撃と
フォトンアーツの動きを確認してみましょう。

多彩な攻撃バリエーションと攻撃回数の多さで
圧倒的なダメージを与えることができます。

ギアを取得している場合、<%WeaponActionText>でかまいたちを出せます。"
